name: Travesia (rena006)
description:
A long time ago, the Kingdom of "Quinchao"
had succumbed to the infinite torment of hell
spread on earth thanks to the depravity of its
own king. Untamed beasts from the underworld
wiped out almost the entire town. "Rogue", one
of the few survivors, decides to kill the demon
king. To achieve this, he needs to sneak into the
lair of a dangerous and eccentric collector,
and steal one of his most precious pieces,
"Aggarath", the dagger of justice, the only
weapon capable of piercing the demon king's
heart.

Art from the following works was

used in the creation of this game.

Modifications were made.

Renata Martinez, Programmer.
Sophia Rojas, Art.
danitorres567, 2d Characters for sidescroller game,
https://opengameart.org/content/2d-characters-for-sidescroller-
game, https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/.
Buch, Spooky Castle Tileset,
https://opengameart.org/content/spooky-castle-tileset,
https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/.
Sharm, Dirt Platformer Tiles,
https://opengameart.org/content/dirt-platformer-tiles.
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/.
ansimuz, Mountain at Dusk Background,
,https://opengameart.org/content/mountain-at-dusk-background,
https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/.
Tio Aimar, 2D Platformer Volcano Pack 1.1,
https://opengameart.org/content/2d-platformer-volcano-pack-11,
https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/.
Matthew Pablo, Heroic Demise [Updated Version],
https://opengameart.org/content/heroic-demise-updated-
version, CC-BY 3.0 (
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/legalcode ).
